triplets: Electronics appliance designed for climate control and indoor air cooling
Cooling indoor spaces, regulating temperature, reducing humidity, and improving air comfort
Outer body of plastic or metal with internal components of copper, aluminum coils, compressors, wiring, and filters
Compressor, condenser coil, evaporator coil, fan, air filter, thermostat, refrigerant pipes, remote control, vents
White, Silver, or Light Grey depending on model
Home appliances, office cooling systems, HVAC systems
20–60 kg depending on window, split, or portable model
25–35 cm for indoor units, larger for outdoor units
